 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשַׁם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשֵׁם‎</span> **verb** ==offend, be guilty== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhGgApAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAaACkAAAJdjI+py+3PgIRRTloBblZvZX1gJxrdVabqyrYfanpmFh51vJwJiee0LVvBVEMKrAgZBjHK1HLJDEKBz2ZOp0NAT6HpbMd1UsUc5O7Kc0zTD6/I/HJv4HN51BWw4x8FADs=">, ***id.***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sin, offence***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIQAoAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAhACgAAAJ0jI+py+0PIwKygnsrxFlv7EVgmFAHRwacqaLhOrGpnNaLa5du99Ax37qxgLpRsHjylRQ+nNJBhBmeUBGVcU16lDTihgn09oSxLXbZiDZl4mQXhJtipdOVl2u/vShxGztrkZMmeEbIZHiIWKZ4wljnKAfpWAAAOw==">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIQAiAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAhACIAAAJpjI+py+0PGQCxhoktxFRnvXHgMy0lKYlIl5wXq3wrbMh05Nb2eJdsjrvFhA6gideDGUnJGe94WKKGUWJVSctJdTaOKpryzsSt8HdU5qKha9lq/SJaQ415yLhlni9wshPt9geXMlhoeFgAADs=">, ***requital, fault, guilt, mulct***, compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhPwATAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAA/ABMAAAJ+jI+py+1vgASw2psmxbwvrXkNSE4XKH7lullmJR2vHAfhOzsrbaL2DKzhWoxdUHjkRYabmk3BbCJboZ+zd6zmkkvqdeol8bhdZXk5thIRudGaHO36oO0TET6FVD1Oq1ldl7Gn9wUmN7ZGN0h4F5YnA7MYmdIhyUiJmam5yVAAADs=">) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשַׁם‎</span> [[Lev.5.19|Lev 5:19]]; [[Num.5.7|Num 5:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשֵׁם‎</span> [[Hab.1.11|Hab 1:11]] + 7 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָֽשְׁמָה‎</span> [[Num.5.6|Num 5:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשָׁ֑מְתָּ‎</span> [[Prov.30.10|Prov 30:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשַׁמְתְּ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.4|Ezek 22:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשֵׁ֑מוּ‎</span> [[Lev.4.13|Lev 4:13]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶאְשַׁם‎</span> [[Hos.4.15|Hos 4:15]] + 13 t.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשֹׁם‎</span> [[Lev.5.19|Lev 5:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשׁוֺם‎</span> [[Ezek.25.12|Ezek 25:12]] — 

**1.** ***commit an offence, a trespass, do a wrong***, or ***an injury***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשֹׁם אָשַׁם ליהוה ׃לְ‎</span> ***he hath done a great wrong to Yahweh*** (in violating the commands) [[Lev.5.19|Lev 5:19]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָתַן לַאֲשֶׁר אָשַׁם לוֺ‎</span> ***and he shall give it*** (restitution) ***to him to whom he did wrong*** [[Num.5.7|Num 5:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[2Chr.19.10|2Chr 19:10]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶאְשְׁמוּ אָשׁוֺם‎</span> ***and they committed lasting wrong*** (irreparable wrong, the Edomites against Judah) [[Ezek.25.12|Ezek 25:12]]. 

**2.** ***be*** or ***become guilty*** [[Judg.21.22|Judg 21:22]]; [[Jer.50.7|Jer 50:7]]; [[Hos.4.15|Hos 4:15]]; [[Hab.1.11|Hab 1:11]] in offences requiring sin-offering [[Lev.4.13|Lev 4:13]]; [[Lev.4.22|Lev 4:22]]; [[Lev.4.27|Lev 4:27]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), of trespass-offering [[Lev.5.2|Lev 5:2]]; [[Lev.5.3|Lev 5:3]]; [[Lev.5.17|Lev 5:17]]; [[Lev.5.23|Lev 5:23]]; [[Num.5.6|Num 5:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> ***guilty of*** [[Lev.5.4|Lev 5:4]]; [[Lev.5.5|Lev 5:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> ***in*** or ***through*** [[Ezek.22.4|Ezek 22:4]]; [[Hos.13.1|Hos 13:1]]. 

**3.** ***be held guilty, bear punishment*** [[Ps.34.22|Ps 34:22]]; [[Ps.34.23|Ps 34:23]]; [[Prov.30.10|Prov 30:10]]; [[Isa.24.6|Isa 24:6]]; [[Jer.2.3|Jer 2:3]]; [[Hos.5.15|Hos 5:15]]; [[Hos.10.2|Hos 10:2]]; [[Hos.14.1|Hos 14:1]]; [[Zech.11.5|Zech 11:5]]; [[Ezek.6.6|Ezek 6:6]] (but compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמֵם‎</span>). **Niph\`al** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶאְשָׁמוּ‎</span> ***suffer punishment*** [[Joel.1.18|Joel 1:18]] (si vera lectio; Me We and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשַׁמּוּ‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמם‎</span>, compare Dr<sup>on the passage</sup>). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַאֲשִׁימֵם‎</span> ***declare them guilty*** [[Ps.5.11|Ps 5:11]].
